# dataType

**Instance Property**

The data type of the struct member.

## Declaration

```swift
var dataType: MTLDataType { get }
```

## Discussion

For information on possible values, see [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLDataType]. If the value is [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLDataType/array], then the [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLStructMember/arrayType()] method returns an object that describes the underlying array. If the value is [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLDataType/struct], then the [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLStructMember/structType()] method returns an object that describes the underlying struct.

## Describing the struct member

- **name**: The name of the struct member.
- **offset**: The location of this member relative to the start of its struct, in bytes.
- **argumentIndex**: The index in the argument table that corresponds to the struct member.
